title: Platform Engineer
summary: At Apple, we believe in the power of technology to enrich people's lives...
description: The Platform Engineer will join a dynamic team, responsible for architecting and maintaining our cutting-edge infrastructure. As a key player, you'll drive the design and implementation of scalable solutions, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams...
preferred_qualifications: Demonstrated ownership and health of CI/CD pipelines from dev to production environments. Understanding of the test pyramid and how that applies across the software development lifecycle. Practical experience building and shipping services on Kubernetes on Azure, GCP, or AWS. Strong programming skills in Python or Java, familiar with databases, SQL, and scripting languages. Understanding of Big Data technologies like Hadoop, Kafka, Spark, Cassandra. Experience with a wide range of modern infrastructure tools and technologies.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $121,909 and $214,500 annualized, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.
